Title: [HCM] DevOps Engineer
Company: Pizza 4P's
Location: 1st Floor, Topaz Building, Sai Gon Pearl, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Binh Thanh District, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh Street, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
ABOUT PIZZA 4P'S

Pizza 4P's is a renowned restaurant chain with a mission to "Make the World Smile for Peace." We're expanding our technological capabilities to enhance customer experiences and streamline operations across our growing network of restaurants through innovative technology solutions and robust infrastructure.
Location: Binh Thanh District, HCMC Work Type: Full Time

POSITION OVERVIEW

As a DevOps Engineer at Pizza 4P's, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between software development and IT operations, implementing automation, and managing our cloud infrastructure. You will play a crucial role in building and maintaining resilient systems that power our restaurant operations, customer-facing applications, and internal tools. Your expertise will ensure continuous delivery of high-quality software while maintaining system stability and security.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Public Cloud Management:

Deploy, manage, and monitor cloud infrastructure primarily on GCP Cloud
Optimize cloud resources for cost-efficiency and scalability
Build and manage cloud infrastructure using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) principles

CI/CD Pipeline Management:
Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate build, test, and deployment processes
Collaborate with development teams to ensure the pipelines are integrated into the software development lifecycle
Establish best practices for application deployment and configuration management

Monitoring and Logging:
Implement and maintain monitoring and logging solutions using tools like Prometheus and Grafana
Actively monitor system performance and resolve issues to maintain high availability and reliability
Respond to alerts and incidents according to established SLAs

Automation and Scripting:
Automate routine tasks and processes using scripting languages such as Python and Bash
Implement automation for deployment, scaling, and infrastructure management
Develop and maintain comprehensive documentation for systems, processes, and runbooks

Infrastructure and Container Management:
Implement and maintain container orchestration using Kubernetes and related technologies
Ensure infrastructure changes are versioned, tested, and managed effectively
Support disaster recovery planning and testing, ensuring business continuity

Troubleshooting and Problem Solving:
Respond to production issues, analyze root causes, and implement long-term fixes
Participate in on-call rotation to provide support for critical production systems
Continuously evaluate and implement new technologies that improve system reliability
Job Requirements:
WHO YOU ARE

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
1-2 years of experience in DevOps, Site Reliability Engineering (SRE), or a similar role
Proficiency in GCP services and cloud management
Experience with CI/CD tools (GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, etc.)
Understanding of containerization and orchestration tools (Docker, Kubernetes)
Experience with monitoring and logging tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK)
Scripting proficiency in Python, Bash, or similar languages
Knowledge of repository management and Git strategies
Experience with Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Ansible, Terraform
Understanding of networking concepts, load balancing, and security best practices
English communication (reading/writing) at a technical working level
Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to troubleshoot complex system issues

Preferred Skills
GCP certification(s)
Experience with serverless architecture and microservices
Knowledge of database administration (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB)
Experience in the hospitality or food service industry
Familiarity with POS systems and integration with cloud services
Understanding of payment processing systems and security requirements
Experience with multi-region deployments and global availability strategies
Knowledge of GitOps principles and tools
Experience with service mesh technologies (Istio, Linkerd)
Experience mentoring junior team members and sharing knowledge

Soft Skills
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
Problem-solving mindset with attention to detail
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
Strong time management and organizational skills
Field: Dịch vụ lưu trú/Nhà hàng/Khách sạn/Du lịch

Title: Sales Executive
Company: Công Ty TNHH Dịch Vụ & Phát Triển Đầu Tư HMG
Location: 440/6 No Trang Long, P13, Binh Thanh, HCM, 440/6 Nơ Trang Long, Phường 13, Quận Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam.
Job Description:
Job Summary
We are looking for a passionate and driven Sales Executive to join our team in the exciting world of beer ingredients as well as distill ingredients trading. In this role, you will be responsible for developing new business opportunities, managing existing client accounts, and acting as a trusted advisor to breweries/distilleries and beverage manufacturers. You’ll be selling key ingredients such as hops, malts, yeasts, and adjuncts, helping clients craft world-class brews.
Type: Full-Time | On-site/Hybrid/Remote

Key Responsibilities
• Develop and maintain strong relationships with brewers, distributors, and supply chain partners.
• Identify new market opportunities and convert prospects into long-term clients.
• Provide technical knowledge and product recommendations tailored to brewing needs.
• Negotiate pricing, contracts, and delivery schedules to meet client needs and company targets.
• Collaborate with the procurement and logistics teams to ensure timely delivery and inventory alignment.
• Attend trade shows, brewery events, and industry expos to represent the company and expand your network.
• Monitor industry trends, competitor activity, and customer feedback to refine sales strategy.
Job Requirements:
• Minimum 2 years of experience in B2B sales, preferably in brewing, beverage, or food ingredients.
• Strong interest or background in brewing, distilling, or food science is a major plus. Studying Food Technology (or a related discipline) is also a plus for junior candidates.
• Good communication and negotiation skills in both Vietnamese and English.
• Technical mindset with the ability to understand brewing processes and ingredients specifications.
• Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently and as part of a team.
• Willingness to travel domestically and occasionally abroad for training or supplier meetings.

Title: Senior Architect
Company: Intes Co., Ltd
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Lầu 3, Tòa nhà Parami, Số 140 Đường Bạch Đằng 2, Phường 2, Quận Tân Bình, Tp HCM
Job Description:
The Senior Architect plays a key role in leading and managing architectural design projects from the conceptual stage to completion. With extensive experience and expertise, the Senior Architect not only ensures the quality of the design but also guides a team of architects in the production of architectural documents through all stages of a project. This position requires strong leadership, exceptional design skills, and in-depth knowledge of construction processes.
- Lead the team in producing architectural documents through all project stages – from Conceptual Design, Basic Design to Detailed Design.
- Ensure that designs not only meet technical requirements but also optimize aesthetics and functionality.

Development of Design Drawings:
- Manage and mentor the team of architects in developing design drawings, design development drawings, technical drawings, construction drawings, and submission drawings for authorities.
- Ensure the accuracy, quality, and legal compliance of all architectural documents.

Comprehensive Architectural Practice:
- Contribute to all aspects of architectural practice, including design, planning, and construction supervision.
- Provide consultation to clients and stakeholders on optimal design solutions.

Design, Planning, 3D Modeling:
- Lead the design, planning, and 3D modeling development for complex projects.
- Apply expertise to solve complex design issues and find creative solutions.

Preparation and Management of Documents:
- Oversee and ensure that all documents, including presentation drawings, working drawings, and construction details, are thoroughly prepared to the highest standards.
- Coordinate the submission of documents and related materials to relevant authorities.

Team Training and Development:
- Guide, train, and develop the junior architect team, enhancing their skills and capabilities.
- Share experience and expertise to build a strong and creative design team.
Job Requirements:
- Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Architecture.
- At least 7-10 years of experience working in the architecture field, with experience in leading projects.
- Excellent leadership, project management, and design skills.
- Proficient in design software such as AutoCAD, Revit, SketchUp, and other 3D design tools.
- Extensive knowledge of building codes, construction processes, and the latest industry trends.
- Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively interact with clients and stakeholders.

• Xây dựng kế hoạch khai thác khách hàng mục tiêu (AP) và phối hợp với GĐCC QHKH/Trưởng nhóm (nếu có) triển khai thực hiện (có sự hỗ trợ của Trưởng phòng/Giám đốc Trung tâm) để đạt các chỉ tiêu đặt ra của cá nhân và nhóm
2. Phát triển khách hàng và Quản trị rủi ro
• Quản lý danh mục khách hàng hiện hữu và khách hàng tiềm năng
• Thiết lập và xây dựng quan hệ chặt chẽ với khách hàng nhằm bán các sản phẩm KHDN Lớn, tư vấn các phương án tài trợ phù hợp
• Hướng dẫn ARM, hỗ trợ RM trong nhóm để lập các tờ trình tín dụng, các văn bản liên quan…
• Ký kiểm soát các tờ trình tín dụng của Khách hàng do mình quản lý trước khi trình lên cấp cao hơn (Trưởng phòng/Chuyên gia phê duyệt/Giám đốc Trung tâm/Lãnh đạo Khối CIB)
• Thực hiện trình và bảo vệ tờ trình tín dụng/tờ trình sử dụng dịch vụ (nếu có) tại Hội đồng Tín dụng các cấp/cấp phê duyệt
• Thường xuyên rà soát danh mục hiện hữu nhằm phát hiện các dấu hiệu cảnh báo sớm các rủi ro tiềm ẩn và báo cáo Trưởng phòng và phối hợp các bên liên quan đề xuất/đưa ra các phương án ứng phó với các rủi ro phát sinh/có khả năng phát sinh và triển khai các phương án quản trị rủi ro đối với từng khách hàng
• Quản lý chất lượng tín dụng, kiểm soát chất lượng tín dụng của các giao dịch của khách hàng mình quản lý và phối hợp với SRM/Trưởng nhóm (nếu có) báo cáo Trưởng phòng và/hoặc Giám đốc Trung tâm khi có những phát sinh bất thường đối với các khoản cấp tín dụng, quản lý nhắc nợ và thu hồi nợ đúng hạn
• Kết hợp với ARM thực hiện báo cáo các cuộc gặp với Khách hàng gửi Trưởng phòng/Giám đốc Trung tâm/Giám đốc Khối
• Phối hợp với ARM để thực hiện các báo cáo tín dụng có liên quan
• Phối hợp cùng bộ phận đầu mối của Khối phục vụ các đoàn thanh tra, kiểm toán, kiểm soát định kỳ và khi phát sinh yêu cầu.
3. Xây dựng sản phẩm, cải tiến qui trình, chất lượng dịch vụ
• Đề xuất/đóng góp ý kiến xây dựng, cải tiến quy trình sản phẩm, cơ chế chính sách, phương thức vận hành… nhằm nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ của VPBank
• Đóng góp ý kiến với bộ phận Phát triển kinh doanh của Khối CIB xây dựng các chương trình khuyến khích/ thúc đẩy bán trong từng thời kỳ.
• Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan xây dựng các sản phẩm mới phù hợp với thực tiễn kinh doanh
4. Quản trị Nhân sự
• Hỗ trợ RM/hướng dẫn ARM trong nhóm trong công tác quản lý khách hàng, giao dịch nội bộ và phát triển ARM thành RM tiềm năng

Title: VPBank Technology Hackathon 2025
Company: VPBank - Https://tuyendung.vpbank.com.vn/
Location: Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Khối Quản Trị Nguồn Nhân Lực - 89 Láng Hạ, Quận Đống Đa, Hà Nội
Job Description:
VPBANK TECHNOLOGY HACKATHON 2025 – ĐẤU TRƯỜNG CÔNG NGHỆ CHÍNH THỨC MỞ ĐƠN ĐĂNG KÝ

1. ĐỐI TƯỢNG THAM GIA
VPBank Technology Hackathon 2025 đã trở lại với quy mô đầu tư lớn hơn, nội dung thách thức hơn và chia thành 2 sân chơi thi đấu riêng biệt:
✅ Junior/Fresh (diễn ra từ Tháng 5 đến tháng 8/2025) - Chương trình dành cho sinh viên mới tốt nghiệp ĐH loại Khá trở lên nhóm ngành CNTT & Khoa học dữ liệu và có dưới 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc.
✅ Senior & Expert (diễn ra từ tháng 9 đến tháng 12/2025) - Chương trình dành cho ứng viên đã tốt nghiệp Đại học và có kinh nghiệm làm việc trên 2 năm.

2. 5 LÝ DO BẠN KHÔNG THỂ BỎ LỠ VPBANK TECHNOLOGY HACKATHON 2025
Với thông điệp "Chinh phục công nghệ, Kiến tạo tương lai", VPBank Technology Hackathon 2025 cam kết mang tới những trải nghiệm đáng giá:
✅ Tự do lựa chọn đề bài công nghệ trong lĩnh vực Ngân hàng để chinh phục thử thách;
✅ Đội ngũ hướng dẫn với gần 40 chuyên gia giàu kinh nghiệm của VPBank cùng AWS sẽ đồng hành & hướng dẫn Bạn qua các chặng thi đấu;
✅ Giải thưởng hấp dẫn bằng tiền mặt từ VPBank & phần thưởng tài trợ từ đối tác AWS;
✅ Cơ hội gia nhập đội ngũ VPBank Young Talents 2025 – với lộ trình phát triển nghề nghiệp chuyên biệt dành cho những thí sinh xuất sắc nhất;
✅ Cơ hội tham gia trực tiếp các dự án công nghệ triệu đô của Ngân hàng & tiếp tục phát triển giải pháp ý tưởng từ Hackathon thành dự án thực tiễn tại VPBank.

3. CÁCH THỨC ĐĂNG KÝ
- Hình thức: Đăng ký theo nhóm (3-5 thành viên) hoặc đăng ký cá nhân (BTC sẽ ghép nhóm)
- Đăng ký ngay tại: https://tuyendung.vpbank.com.vn/landing/VPBankTechnologyHackathon2025.html
Job Requirements:
VPBank Technology Hackathon 2025 tiếp tục triển khai tương tự format chương trình năm 2024 đã phối hợp thành công cùng AWS. Cụ thể, VPBank đưa ra các thử thách (challenge statements) để Nhóm tham gia lựa chọn và đề xuất ý tưởng, giải pháp công nghệ và hiện thực hóa giải pháp thông qua kỹ năng, kinh nghiệm để phát triển giải pháp đó trên nền tảng online của AWS. Chương trình bao gồm 5 Phases:

- Phase 0: Registration - Đăng ký & sơ loại hồ sơ (Online)

- Phase 1: Learn - Kick-off giới thiệu chương trình & AWS fundamentals (Offline & Online)

- Phase 2: Ideation – Nhóm tham gia xây dựng ý tưởng giải pháp cho thử thách và submit online

- Phase 3: Develop - Nhóm tham gia xây dựng giải pháp theo thử thách đã lựa chọn trên nền tảng AWS online

- Phase 4: Compete - Nhóm tham gia có giải pháp xuất sắc nhất trình bày tại Final Round (Offline).

- Phase 5: Selection & Hiring Process – Nhóm/cá nhân có kết quả xuất sắc nhất theo tiêu chí chấm điểm của Chương trình & theo kết quả của Hội đồng chấm điểm sẽ nhận được các phần thưởng từ VPBank (cash), quà tặng từ AWS (Gift card) và ưu tiên tuyển dụng chính thức vào VPBank (Đơn vị đánh giá và lựa chọn theo qui trình tuyển dụng tại VPBank)

Title: Home Racer - Customer Value Management Specialist
Company: Home Credit Vietnam - Explore Your Dream Team
Location: 20 Nguyễn Đăng Giai, Thảo Điền, Thủ Đức, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Phu Nu Building, 20 Nguyen Dang Giai, Thao Dien Ward, District 2, HCMC
Job Description:
*According to Decree No.13/2023/ND-CP on protecting personal data (“PDP”), Home Credit Vietnam would apply "Personal Data Processing Agreement" with all candidates to ensure compliance with the decree.

By submitting this application to Home Credit Vietnam Finance Company Limited through Vietnamwork, you agree to allow Home Credit to proceed your provided information in accordance with Personal Data Processing Agreement that you have read, fully understood and agreed to the entire content at link https://career.homecredit.vn/vn/article/id/217.

The Home Racer Program 2025 is a 6-month immersive journey tailored for passionate fresh graduates and early-career professionals with less than 2 years of experience in Data or Commercial fields.

At Home Credit, growth isn’t one-size-fits-all.
That’s why Home Racer is designed as a structured yet flexible development program, combining a clear roadmap, shared milestones, and personalized support to match your unique ambition. It’s where a common path meets personal purpose.

Throughout the journey, you’ll take on real, high-impact projects and grow through expert mentorship — all while defining your own pace and goals.

Join us to shape your future at Home Credit Vietnam.
Own Your Race.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

CUSTOMER VALUE MANAGEMENT SPECIALIST: Customers don’t just want products - they want relevance. In this role, you’ll drive transformation and shape customer journey to deliver the right product to the right person at the right time.
• Plan and execute the CRM campaigns by identifying customer needs through data and recommending targeted actions to boost engagement.
• Do the campaign analysis and A/B testing to drive continuous optimization and improvement.
• Coordinate with cross-functional teams to roll out campaigns which ensure customer-centric and business-aligned outcomes.
Job Requirements:
JOB REQUIREMENTS

• University graduate with GPA of 3/4 and 7.5/10 and less than 2-year working experience.
• Proficient in English with a level of IELTS 6.5 or equivalent.
• Passion for financial products, with a focus on improving customer experience and operational performance through product and lifecycle enhancements.
• Strong logical thinking, problem-solving skills, communication & presentation skills to detect the business situation then propose positive changes.
• Effectively work both in a team & on your own.
• Willingness to learn & absorb new knowledge.
• Good Customer Obsession, Entrepreneurship, Integrity, Operation Excellence & Digital Savviness mindset, as it’s our core Leadership Qualities.

COMPENSATIONS & BENEFITS

• Shape Your Path Forward: Kickstart your career with a structured journey from onboarding, hands-on real-world projects , and a clear path to an official role within 6 months.
• Drive Real Business Impact: Take on cross-functional projects that tackle real business challenges, guided by leaders and mentors to sharpen your problem-solving mindset.
• Transform Your Potential: Accelerate your growth with e-learning, on-the-job training, and continuous development across foundational, functional and business skills.
• Enjoy Competitive Rewards: Receive competitive rewards, performance-based recognition, and total support to keep you motivated, valued, and ready for the next milestone.
• Thrive in a DEI Culture: Be part of a team where everyone belongs, build strong connections and experience #LifeAtHomeCredit.
• Work Where You Belong: Wrap up your Home Racer journey and launch your long-term future in a global environment that nurtures your full potential.
Keyword: Home Credit Vietnam - Explore Your Dream Team

Title: General Manager - Social Commerce
Company: Công Ty TNHH Onpoint
Location: 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Đa Kao, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, Tầng 4 toà nhà AB, 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, P. Đa Kao, Quận 1, TP.HCM
Job Description:
OnPoint is building the future of commerce — creator-led, AI-powered, and platform-native. Your mission is to build and scale OnPoint into the #1 TikTok commerce partner in Vietnam and Southeast Asia. You will lead a high-performance team across verticals, livestreaming, creator marketing, AI content, and TikTok Shop operations to drive full-funnel growth for brands on TikTok.
Responsibilities:
1. Business Strategy & P&L Ownership
• Define and execute OnPoint’s TikTok commerce strategy — from market positioning to channel operations.
• Own TikTok channel revenue, GMV, contribution margin, and cost structure.
• Lead quarterly and annual business planning for TikTok verticals across categories (beauty, F&B, mom & baby…).
2. Full-Funnel Growth Leadership
• Oversee and integrate performance across awareness, consideration, and conversion stages.
• Collaborate closely with content, creators, ad ops, and commercial teams to build end-to-end success stories.
• Scale TikTok-native hero SKUs and drive campaign-level ROAS and funnel lift.
3. Livestream & Hero SKU Acceleration
• Build and manage a high-performing livestream team (hosts, producers, schedulers).
• Drive SKU selection, promotion planning, and livestream calendar management.
• Turn top-performing SKUs into long-term revenue engines.
4. Creator Commerce & Partnership
• Develop a strong creator commerce engine — including recruitment, partnerships, and creator incentive models.
• Partner with TikTok (regional teams) to secure exclusive pilots, programs, and beta tools.
• Lead co-branded projects, campaign integrations, and “creator + brand” success models.
5. Data & Tech-Driven Optimization
• Leverage TikTok tools like Market Scope, TMS, and AI content generators to inform real-time decisions.
• Work with data & product teams to optimize SKUs, creative performance, and funnel drop off.
• Introduce experimentation culture (A/B tests, ROAS tracking, creator uplift).
Job Requirements:
Must have
• Have 10+ years of experience in e-commerce/social commerce, digital marketing, or platform growth (experience with TikTok is a plus).
• Is both strategic and hands-on — can lead vision but also execute with discipline.
• Have built or led high-performance teams in commercial, marketing, or growth domains.
• Know how to work across functions: commercial, creative, ops, and analytics.
• Thrive in fast-changing, high-growth environments.
Preferred
• Experience scaling social commerce.
• Familiarity with AI-powered tools for content automation or campaign planning.
• Prior experience working in regional/SEA markets.
Competency Requirements
• Strategic thinking & market insight: Ability to spot trends and translate them into scalable business plays.
• People leadership & collaboration: Build strong teams and partnerships across functions and geographies.
• Execution excellence: Drive high-quality execution and fast problem-solving under dynamic conditions.
• Growth & performance mindset: Relentless focus on customer impact, commercial results, and continuous improvement.

Why Join OnPoint?

- Category leadership: Be the driving force behind South east Asia leading TikTok commerce engine.
- End-to-end ownership: Shape strategy, build teams, and own results across all levers.
- Innovation-first culture: Work in a high-growth environment that embraces experimentation, speed, and AI-driven transformation.
- Regional growth: Join OnPoint’s expansion journey across Southeast Asia.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn

Title: Back Office Manager (Japanese Company - Japanese Speaking)
Company: Navigos Search's Client
Location: Hanoi Head Office, Hanoi
Job Description:
Job Overview
We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented professional to join our team in Hanoi. This role primarily focuses on general affairs, accounting support, and language interpretation/translation tasks. You will work closely with both Vietnamese and Japanese colleagues, and will be an essential link between internal teams and external partners.
________________________________________
Key Responsibilities
• General Affairs, Accounting, and Tax Support
o Handle day-to-day general administrative duties.
o Support accounting and tax-related work (note: monthly bookkeeping is outsourced).
o A mentor will guide the new hire initially, but the role requires growing into an independent working style.

• Interpretation & Translation
o Provide Japanese–English–Vietnamese interpretation during internal meetings, client visits, and group company events.
o Translate business documents and emails as needed.

• Visitor & Travel Arrangements
o Coordinate hotel and restaurant bookings for business visitors from Japan.
o Support logistics for internal and external events.

• Additional Opportunities
o Depending on capability and interest, the role may expand to include real estate project-related tasks in the future.
Job Requirements:
• Nationality: Vietnamese
• Gender: Female
• Age: Around 30 years old
• Experience:
• Prior work experience at a Japanese company is required, especially experience dealing with local authorities and knowledge of Japanese business culture.
• Familiarity with accounting/tax terms (in a business context) is expected, though deep technical expertise is not required.

• Skills:
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
• Ability to work proactively and coordinate tasks smoothly.
• Business-level proficiency in Japanese (essential) and English (required for meetings and document translation).

Title: Government Affairs Manager (Cambodia - Contractor)
Company: Page Group Vietnam
Location: Other, Cambodia
Job Description:
Seeking a seasoned professional to lead external affairs and regulatory engagement in Cambodia. The role involves monitoring policy developments, managing government and stakeholder relations, and supporting business continuity through strategic advocacy and compliance. The successful candidate will serve as the primary liaison with government bodies, industry associations, and other key stakeholders.


Description

Regulatory Strategy & Risk Monitoring

 * Lead the regulatory affairs agenda, ensuring proactive planning and execution of stakeholder engagement strategies to protect and advance business priorities.
 * Monitor and analyze key public policy developments (e.g., excise taxation, health warnings, anti-illicit trade measures) to identify risks, opportunities, and business implications in the short to medium term.

Stakeholder Engagement & Government Relations

 * Build and nurture strong, trust-based relationships with government authorities, regulatory bodies, industry associations, and business partners.
 * Represent the company in high-level dialogues with public institutions, private sector entities, and trade forums.
 * Map key stakeholders and contribute expert input in areas such as taxation, customs, and brand protection.

Regulatory Advocacy & Compliance Support

 * Draft policy position papers, regulatory assessments, and advocacy briefs aligned with corporate objectives.
 * Support the company's certification processes and ensure compliance with relevant regulatory requirements.
 * Deliver regular updates and strategic insights to regional and cluster leadership.

Administrative & Reporting

 * Provide administrative coordination and timely reporting to ensure alignment across internal teams and external engagements.


Profile

* Minimum 10 years of experience in government relations, regulatory affairs, or public policy within multinational, regulated industries.
 * Bachelor's degree in Law, Political Science, International Relations, or a related discipline from a recognized institution.
 * Strong knowledge of Cambodian regulatory systems, with an extensive and well-established government network.
 * Legal background is a strong asset.
 * Demonstrated commercial acumen and strategic business thinking.
 * Excellent communication skills in both Khmer and English (written and verbal).


Job Offer

* Competitive salary package with performance-based bonus.
 * Direct exposure to top-level leadership and strategic decision-making.
 * Career progression to C-level position.


To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Nhung Le at .

Job Description:
Mục đích Công việc:
Kiểm tra, giám sát các giao dịch với khách hàng tại quầy giao dịch theo quy định, quy trình của Ngân hàng, đảm bảo cho các hoạt động tại bộ phận giao dịch với khách hàng được thực hiện chính xác, nhanh và an toàn. Không ngừng cải tiến và nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ khách hàng để đạt được mục tiêu kinh doanh.

Nhiệm vụ chính:
• Hướng dẫn, kiểm tra, kiểm soát, phê duyệt các giao dịch do Giao dịch viên thực hiện; kiểm soát các chứng từ hạch toán.
• Hướng dẫn nghiệp vụ, đôn đốc, giám sát công việc hàng ngày của các Giao dịch viên.
• Kiểm tra các tài khoản trung gian; chứng kiến kiểm quỹ cuối ngày và kiểm tra, đối chiếu với sổ sách của bộ phận kho quỹ và số tồn kho thực tế (đối với KSV ở Phòng giao dịch).
• Kiểm soát lại chứng từ giao dịch tại quầy trước khi bàn giao cho bộ phận hậu kiểm.
• Giải thích, hướng dẫn, thu thập thông tin từ khách hàng đồng thời có trách nhiệm phản hồi đến Quản lý trực tiếp và các bộ phận liên quan.
• Giải quyết các khiếu nại, thắc mắc của khách hàng liên quan đến nghiệp vụ giao dịch.
• Lập và gửi các báo cáo liên quan đến nghiệp vụ giao dịch theo yêu cầu.
• Trợ giúp/tham mưu cho Trưởng phòng về các nghiệp vụ, quy trình, quy định liên quan tới nghiệp vụ.
• Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác do Trưởng phòng phân công.
Job Requirements:
Yêu cầu:
• Trình độ đào tạo: tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, chuyên ngành Kinh tế, Tài chính, Ngân hàng.
• Yêu cầu về kinh nghiệm: có ít nhất 03 năm kinh nghiệm làm về tác nghiệp tại quầy trong tổ chức tín dụng.
• Yêu cầu chuyên môn:
• Am hiểu về lĩnh vực tài chính, ngân hàng cũng như các quy định về pháp luật liên quan tới nghiệp vụ;
• Nắm vững các quy định của Ngân hàng Nhà nước liên quan đến dịch vụ khách hàng và hoạt động tác nghiệp ngân hàng;
• Am hiểu các quy trình, quy định, các sản phẩm dịch vụ của Ngân hàng;
• Hiểu về luật và các quy định về phòng chống rửa tiền.
• Yêu cầu về kỹ năng mềm:
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp;
• Kỹ năng chăm sóc khách hàng;
• Kỹ năng quản lý;
• Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm.
• Yêu cầu khác:
• Trình độ ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh chứng chỉ C trở lên hoặc các chứng chỉ tương đương. có khả năng giao tiếp tốt bằng tiếng Anh.
• Tin học: thành thạo tin học văn phòng ( Ms Word, excel, power point).
• Cẩn thận, nghiêm túc, chuyên nghiệp trong quá trình làm việc.
• Chịu được cường độ làm việc cao và sức ép lớn.

Title: Distribution Administration Senior Assistant

Responsible for quality and highly professional services for functions of DA such as: Check AVICAD system, Check AML, code generation, agent movements (promotion, demotion, termination, transfer…), reports/contests … for assigned channels/Partners.

Developing skillful, Business rules, compensations for channels, professional Distribution Admin with various and effective training and coaching

- Deliver all channel’ s Compensation related tasks, both routine and ad-hoc to meet multi-requirements on timely manner

• University Degree in Economics/Mathematics/Business Administration or IT/technical related
• Compensation/reports related experience in Multi-national life insurance companies: at least 1year
• Fresh graduate is acceptable
• Administration process and procedure in Multi-national companies as a plus
• Good knowledge of Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Access
• Good at Mathematics
• Analytical and strong problem-solving abilities
• Good Communication and presentation skill in both Vietnamese and English
• Work organization skill
• Teamwork spirit.

Job Description:
* Nhiệm vụ chung
- Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý tất cả hoạt động của Phòng Kinh Doanh từ giai đoạn phát triển dự án, chuẩn bị bán hàng, tiền bán hàng đến giai đoạn bán hàng chính thức.
- Chịu trách nhiệm báo cáo các hoạt động và hiệu quả kinh doanh tới Ban Lãnh đạo.

* Giai đoạn Phát triển dự án & chuẩn bị bán hàng: Xây dựng chiến lược kinh doanh tổng thể, lập kế hoạch và triển khai theo chiến lược kinh doanh sau khi được Ban Lãnh đạo phê duyệt:
- Xây dựng phương thức bán hàng (bán booking, chọn căn,...)
- Xây dựng bảng giá sản phẩm (khoảng giá, giá cơ sở, giá test...)
- Quy hoạch ngân sách bán hàng
- Phối hợp với Bộ phận tài chính kế toán lập kế hoạch tài chính & dòng tiền kinh doanh
- Xây dựng chiến lược ra hàng, phân kỳ bán hàng
- Xây dựng chính sách bán hàng theo từng kỳ
- Tổ chức và lực lượng bán hàng (inhouse/đại lý độc quyền/đại lý mở) và triển khai hệ thống bán hàng
+ Quản lý giỏ hàng, phân bổ nguồn hàng
+ Xây dựng kịch bản bán hàng nội bộ, phối hợp với Phòng Marketing để hoàn thiện Tài liệu bán hàng
+ Điều phối công tác bán hàng, tìm kiếm lead, chuyển đổi từ lead sang sales
- Làm việc với ngân hàng thực hiện các gói hỗ trợ tài chính, chiết khấu cho Khách hàng
- Xây dựng Chính sách hoa hồng, thưởng nóng đối với CTV, inhouse, đại lý độc quyền/đại lý mở…)
- Quản trị rủi ro kinh doanh

* Giai đoạn Rumor – Tiền bán hàng
- Xây dựng chính sách đại lý, tuyển chọn & quản lý đại lý tham gia bán
- Rumor Đại lý
- Triển khai hoạt động ký kết hợp tác đại lý phân phối
- Tổ chức các chương trình Kick-off bán hàng
- Đào tạo nội bộ và đại lý về sản phẩm, chính sách bán hàng, quy trình giao dịch, truyền lửa cho mạng lưới bán hàng để luôn giữ nhịp độ bán hàng tốt

* Giai đoạn bán hàng chính thức
- Đẩy mạnh hoạt động bán hàng và hỗ trợ các đại lý bán hàng
- Định kỳ thực hiện đánh giá kết quả bàn hàng của đại lý, hệ thống CTV, inhouse và phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan tiến hành thủ tục trả hoa hồng
- Căn cứ tình hình kinh doanh, diễn biến thị trường tiến hành điều chỉnh các chính sách phù hợp (Chính sách bán hàng, đại lý, bổ sung, đổi đại lý…)

* Thực hiện các công việc khác theo phân công của Ban Lãnh đạo

- Yêu cầu bắt buộc: có 5 năm giữ vai trò Trưởng phòng Kinh doanh tại các đơn vị là chủ đầu tư hoặc đơn vị phân phối bất động sản.

• Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết trình và làm việc đội nhóm
• Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch, tổng hợp, phân tích báo cáo

Thái độ & Con người phù hợp
• Chủ động, quyết đoán và chịu áp lực công việc cao

Title: Officer, Solutions Delivery
Company: British University Vietnam (Buv)
Location: Ecopark township, Van Giang, Hung Yen, Ecopark campus, Ecopark Township, Van Giang district, Hung Yen
Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE

We are looking for an experienced and passionate Business Engagement Officer to join our team! As a Business Engagement Officer at our company, you will have the opportunity to work on new and exciting projects and further develop your career.

The Business Engagement Officer will interact with clients to analyze business processes and evaluate requirements, liaise with various stakeholders to ensure alignment between business objectives and ICT solutions.

To be successful as a Business Engagement Officer, you should have strong analytical and communication skills, be proactive in identifying opportunities for improvement, and be adept at managing projects effectively.

AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY

Business Analysis

• Analyze existing business processes to identify inefficiencies and propose opportunities for improvement through digital transformation initiatives.

• Interacting with clients to understand and evaluate business requirements to ensure alignment with project scopes & organizational goals.

• Support in preparing essential project-related documentation, including business cases, requirements, and process workflows

Project Assistance

• Support Project Manager to coordinate activities for ensuring timelines are adhered to.

• Track project progress and verify that deliverables align with established requirements.

• Assisst Project Manager to build clear and efficient communication among teams to address challenges and ensure project objectives are met.

• Prepare and maintain key project documents, including proposals, progress reports, and final deliverables.

• Update regurlar reports ensuring clarity, accuracy and comprehension to stakeholders on project milestones and outcomes.

Product/Solution Supporting

• Act as a liaison between vendors, business users, and technical teams to facilitate effective communication.

• Provide timely feedback to stakeholders to enhance collaboration and mutual understanding.
Job Requirements:
POSITION SPECIFICATIONS

COMPETENCIES (knowledge, skills, and abilities)

Essential

• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent with a focus on on computer science, information technology, systems development or a related field.

• Proficiency in English (Speaking, Reading & Writing).

• Analytical and detail-oriented mindset with the ability to evaluate complex processes.

• Excellent communication and critical thinking skills.

• Good project management skills, including planning, organization, and time management.

• Familiarity with tools for documenting requirements, modeling workflows, and managing projects.

• Self-motivated with a curious mindset and willingness to research new domains and learn new things.

Desirable

• Previous work experience in business engagement or a relevant role.

• Strong verbal and written communication skills.

• High-level proficiency with MS Office programs and work-related software.

COMPETENCIES (behavioural)

Essential

• Ability to work independently as well as team collaboration.
• Customer & service orientation.
• Planning & organising
• Effective Communication
• Passion & drive.

Desirable

• Creative thinking & innovation
• Relationship building & networking
Keyword: Phân Tích Kinh Doanh/Phân Tích Hệ Thống
Industry1: Phân Tích Kinh Doanh/Phân Tích Hệ Thống

Title: Business Development Manager Blowers
Company: Ingersoll Rand Vietnam
Location: 243A De La Thanh 13th Floor, ICON4 Building Dong Da District Ha Noi, No.106 Nguyen Van Troi Street, Ward 8 Room 903, 9th Floor, Centre Point Building Ho Chi Minh City Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Job Summary
The Business Development Manager will be based in Hanoi, Vietnam and is accountable to generate profitable sales revenue and increase operating income by broadening sales coverage, establishing new channel partners & customers. He/she will be responsible for both capital equipment and aftermarket sales for Blowers Products.

Responsibilities

• Identify, recruit and on-board new channel partners.
• Create opportunities from key accounts, competitor’s customers, and new projects
• Manage sales activities of partners by creating and executing business plans to generate revenue and meet sales targets.
• Analyse market trends and develop sales plans to increase brand presence.
• Evaluate partner sales performance, recommend improvements, educate about product portfolio and service offerings.
• Address partner related issues such as sales conflicts and pricing issues in a timely manner.
• Manage sales pipeline, forecast monthly sales, and identify new business opportunities.
• Attending trade shows, conferences, marketing, and other events to develop positive relationships and partners and customers.
• Work closely with supply chain management, sales support and project engineer and order fulfilment team.
• Other responsibilities as assigned or required.
Job Requirements:
Basic Qualifications
• Diploma in Mechanical/Electronics Engineering or other Engineering background with sales experience selling industrial products.
• Have experiences doing business with partners and end-users in Wastewater Treatment, Contractors, Foods & Beverages industries are advantage.
• Fluent in English or Chinese

Travel & Work Arrangements/Requirements
Travel within Vietnam mainly, based on business needs.

Key Competencies
• Customer Orientation
• Ownership
• Business Awareness

Title: Admission Executive / Chuyên Viên Tuyển Sinh
Company: CÔNG TY TNHH GIÁO DỤC DU LỊCH KHÁCH SẠN ĐỊA ỐC THÀNH PHỐ ĐẢO PHÚ QUỐC
Location: 66A Phổ Quang, Phường 2, Quận Tân Bình, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam., 66a Phổ Quang, phường 02, quận Tân Bình, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Student Recruitment & Counseling
• Provide accurate and timely information to prospective students and parents about programs, admissions procedures, and career opportunities.
• Conduct campus tours, info sessions, and participate in recruitment events or education fairs.
Application Management
• Handle the end-to-end admissions process, including application intake, document verification, interview coordination, and offer issuance.
• Maintain applicant records and ensure timely updates in the admissions system.
Communication & Follow-Up
• Maintain consistent and professional communication with applicants via email, phone, and in-person meetings.
• Follow up regularly to guide applicants through the decision-making and enrollment process.
Collaboration & Coordination
• Work closely with academic teams, marketing, and student services to ensure a smooth admissions journey.
• Coordinate with the finance department on application fees and tuition payments.
Reporting & Data Management
• Prepare regular reports on application trends, conversion rates, and student demographics.
• Monitor and analyze admission data to support continuous improvement.
Compliance & Documentation
• Ensure adherence to admissions policies and regulatory requirements.
• Maintain confidentiality and proper filing of student records.
Customer Experience & Branding
• Uphold the Academy’s image and reputation through a warm, service-minded, and professional approach.
• Contribute to creating a positive and welcoming first impression for all prospective students.
Job Requirements:
• 2+ years of experience in student recruitment or admissions or student related role at University/College.
• Minimum—Bachelor’s degree.

Title: Distribution Center Supervisor
Company: Công Ty TNHH Kimberly-Clark Việt Nam
Location: Bình Dương, Vietnam, 18th floor, E.Town Central Building, 11 Doan Van Bo, ward 12, D4, HCMC
Job Description:
• Position summary:
- The DC Supervisor has the responsibility for creating and preparing all deliveries and shipments being despatched. And control of all inventories, stock takes within the Distribution Centre as well as the investigation and root cause analysis of credit claims.
- This position is also responsible for ensuring all credits; Return Goods Authority’s (RGA), Proof Of Deliveries (POD) associated with these shipments are monitored, recorded and completed in a timely manner. Also, assure inventories accurate in a timely record in system and physical
- Key Performance Indicators of error tracking of short and over delivery’s, internal transfer, repack movement’s and stock accuracy also need to be tracked with reports produced and discussed with Management and results displayed.

• Accountabilities:
To execute Warehouse & Distribution operation including:
- Coordinating with transporters for trucking, sailing, railing requirement and arrangement.
- Coordinating with warehouse for loading and unloading or any other warehousing control activities.
- Customer service: shipment information to customer, delivery tracking, delivery confirmation etc
- Internal transfer: shipment information to receiver, delivery tracking, delivery confirmation etc
- Combining delivery orders to maximize truck utilization.
- Warehouse control: stock movement control, stock accuracy owner, promptly take action
- Perform all of performance management to service providers
- Perform all of transactions into Software System.
To ensure document control and transportation tracking, planning system is in place:
- Distribution planning to meet customer orders and services.
- Transportation planning to meet replenishment for warehouses.
- Transportation and shipping documents are recorded, authorised and documented.
- Transportation cost, distribution cost tracking.
- Document and file all of Delivering & Receiving for materials movements as retention records.
To improve individual job skills and contribute to team work building:
- Document and file all of Delivering & Receiving for material movements as retention records.
- Compliance with department procedures, company policies.
- Taking training courses held by company for job skill improvement.
- Team working.
To maintain hygiene and safe working environment at sites:
- SMART and 5’S, Visual control implementation.
- Firefighting.
- GMP.
Job Requirements:
- University degree plus 2-3 years experiences in similar areas.
- Advanced computer skill, Knowledge SAP software using.
- Basic Level of English would be advantageous.
- Emphasized common skills: Analysis, Problem solving, Planning, Organizing, Initiative, Decision Making, Flexibility, Thoroughness, Written/Oral Communication, Results Orientation and Integrity
Keyword: Công Ty TNHH Kimberly-Clark Việt Nam

Title: Chuyên Viên Hậu Mãi
Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐẦU TƯ NAM LONG
Location: 6 Nguyễn Khắc Viện, Phường Tân Phú, Quận 7, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 6 Nguyễn Khắc Viện, Phường Tân Phú, Quận 7, TP Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Mô tả chung
- Quản lý, điều phối và giám sát các hoạt động thu hồi công nợ của khách hàng, đảm bảo đạt tỷ lệ thu tiền đến hạn và giảm thiểu nợ quá hạn.
- Phân tích, đánh giá rủi ro nợ xấu và đề xuất các giải pháp xử lý kịp thời, hiệu quả.
- Duy trì mối quan hệ tốt với khách hàng và đảm bảo tính minh bạch trong hoạt động thu hồi công nợ.

Trách nhiệm chính
1. Giám sát công nợ, đốc thúc nhân viên thu hồi đảm bảo tỷ lệ thu tiền đến hạn, đảm bảo các công đoạn (kiểm tra, nhắc nợ, ra thông báo, xác nhận thanh toán, …) được thực hiện đúng & đủ (30%)
- Giám sát việc soạn thảo, phát hành thông báo thanh toán và việc liên hệ với khách hàng để đôn đốc thanh toán của nhân viên.
- Kiểm tra và xác nhận tình hình thanh toán cho các Phòng Ban liên quan (như BP chủ quyền, BP bàn giao, …).
- Đảm bảo việc phát hành Xác nhận thanh toán theo yêu cầu của Khách hàng.
- Kiểm soát việc lưu trữ hồ sơ file cứng/file mềm lên ổ chung, Landsoft (như thông báo thanh toán, đơn đề nghị được duyệt, …) theo dự án được phân công.
- Giám sát việc theo dõi, lưu trữ bill báo phát thông báo qua hình thức chuyển phát nhanh.
- Đảm bảo quản lý và bảo mật thông tin khách hàng
2. Xử lý nợ quá hạn (30%)
- Chỉ đạo và phân tích, đánh giá rủi ro nợ xấu, xác định các khách hàng có nguy cơ cao.
- Giám sát việc lập danh sách và theo dõi các khách hàng có lịch sử nợ chậm thanh toán, mất khả năng thanh toán.
- Phối hợp với bộ phận Kinh doanh/Luật sư/Kế toán/Quan hệ Khách hàng nhằm xử lý các khoản nợ xấu một cách hiệu quả theo quy trình/Chính sách của Công ty.
- Đàm phán và chỉ đạo đưa ra các phương án xử lý linh hoạt, phù hợp với tình hình của khách hàng nhằm đạt được sự đồng thuận và niềm tin của Khách hàng...
3. Giải quyết đề nghị Khách hàng (10%)
- Đảm bảo việc giải đáp đúng và đủ các thắc mắc của khách hàng liên quan đến công nợ.
- Giám sát việc thực hiện & theo dõi việc giải quyết đề nghị liên quan thu hồi công nợ như gia hạn thanh toán/Miễn-giảm lãi phạt chậm thanh toán/ thanh lý hợp đồng/chuyển nhượng/hoàn tiền thanh toán dư theo quy trình/chính sách của Công ty.
- Phối hợp các phòng ban liên quan đề xuất các phương án giải quyết đề nghị/ khiếu nại của khách hàng và trình cấp quản lý.
- Xây dựng mối quan hệ tốt đẹp với khách hàng, tạo dựng niềm tin và sự hợp tác lâu dài.
4. Báo cáo và dự báo (10%)
- Lập báo cáo định kỳ về tình hình thu hồi nợ, tỷ lệ nợ xấu, thời gian thu hồi nợ và các vấn đề liên quan.
- Phân tích, dự phóng dòng tiền thu hàng tháng/hàng quý cho các bộ phận liên quan.
- Thực hiện các báo cáo KPI thu nợ, tỉ lệ xứ lý nợ quá hạn và các báo cáo khác theo yêu cầu và chỉ đạo của Quản lý trực tiếp.
5. Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu & chỉ đạo của Quản lý trực tiếp (10%)
6. Xây dựng một tổ chức hiệu suất cao và liên kết các yếu tố mới tạo nên sự tăng trưởng (5%)
- Thấm nhuần văn hóa đổi mới và cải tiến liên tục. Xây dựng các tiêu chuẩn, liên kết với các Khối COE để có các Quy trình vận hành tiêu chuẩn (SOP), v.v.
- Thúc đẩy sự chuyên môn chức năng bằng cách đảm bảo áp dụng các công cụ, phương pháp luận và phương thức thực hành tốt nhất, thông qua sự hợp tác chặt chẽ với các EC, COE, JV.
- Phát triển tài năng: thu hút, xây dựng và tăng cường các nguồn lực
7. Thúc đẩy một môi trường tổ chức lành mạnh (5%)
- Xác định và tích cực trở thành hình mẫu cho các giá trị Nam Long: Chính trực, Chuyên Nghiệp và Tinh Thần Làm Chủ
- Đảm bảo sự cộng tác, giao tiếp và mối quan hệ tương tác tốt giữa các đơn vị kinh doanh và các đơn vị chức năng tập đoàn.
- Chỉ đạo giải quyết các xung đột trong nội bộ hoặc giữa NLL và các đơn vị khác. Giảm thiểu rủi ro trong hoạt động kinh doanh.
Job Requirements:
Trình độ / Kinh nghiệm
- Trình độ học vấn: Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Quản trị kinh doanh, Kế toán, Kinh tế, Luật.
- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong vai trò công nợ/Hợp đồng từ 2 năm trở lên
- Sử dụng tốt ứng dụng MS Office và phần mềm kế toán.

Kỹ năng chuyên môn
- Kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề:
- Kỹ năng giao tiếp và đàm phán
- Khả năng chịu áp lực công việc
- Kỹ năng quản lý đội nhóm và điều phối công việc.

Năng lực
- Năng lực sắp xếp, điều phối công việc
- Năng lực thích ứng sự thay đổi
- Năng lực lãnh đạo và tạo động lực.

Tư duy & hành vi
- Cẩn thận và chính xác
- Tư duy tích cực, năng động và chuyên nghiệp
- Có tinh thần trách nhiệm
- Luôn nỗ lực thực hiện đúng cam kết của mình
- Phối hợp tốt với các bộ phận liên quan
- Quản lý và bảo mật thông tin khách hàng.

Title: Chuyên Viên Kỹ Thuật Bán Hàng (Presales Kỹ Thuật)

Location: G-Group Tower - Số 5 Nguyễn Thị Duệ, Trung Hòa, Cầu Giấy, Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, G-Group Tower - Số 5 Nguyễn Thị Duệ, Trung Hòa, Cầu Giấy
Job Description:
- Hỗ trợ đội ngũ kinh doanh trong việc tư vấn, xây dựng và trình bày các giải pháp công nghệ phù hợp với nhu cầu của khách hàng.
- Phân tích yêu cầu kỹ thuật của khách hàng, phối hợp với các bộ phận kỹ thuật để thiết kế giải pháp tối ưu.
- Chuẩn bị tài liệu thuyết trình, bản đề xuất (proposal), và các tài liệu kỹ thuật liên quan.
- Tham gia các buổi gặp gỡ, demo sản phẩm/dịch vụ, và trả lời các câu hỏi kỹ thuật từ khách hàng.
- Đánh giá và đề xuất các sản phẩm, giải pháp công nghệ mới để đáp ứng xu hướng thị trường.
- Phối hợp với đội ngũ triển khai để đảm bảo tính khả thi của giải pháp trước khi ký hợp đồng.
- Cập nhật thông tin về sản phẩm, dịch vụ và xu hướng công nghệ để nâng cao chất lượng tư vấn.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Kỹ thuật, hoặc các ngành liên quan
- Có Kỹ năng khai thác thông tin khách hàng, dự án.
- Có ít nhất 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm trong vai trò Presale, Tư vấn giải pháp, hoặc vị trí tương tự trong ngành công nghệ.
- Hiểu biết sâu về các giải pháp công nghệ (ví dụ: Cloud, AI, Big Data, IoT, Cybersecurity, hoặc các phần mềm doanh nghiệp)
- Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết trình và đàm phán tốt; khả năng làm việc với nhiều đối tượng khách hàng.
- Kỹ năng phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề nhanh chóng.
- Kỹ năng xây dựng tài liệu và thuyết trình sản phẩm.
- Có Background: technical đi lên
- Có khả năng làm việc nhóm và chịu áp lực công việc cao

QUYỀN LỢI
- Lương thưởng cạnh tranh;
- Môi trường công nghệ với Văn hóa doanh nghiệp chất lừ, trẻ trung, năng động, luôn nhận được sự hỗ trợ tận tâm từ đồng nghiệp.
- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân sự khi trở thành Nhân sự chính thức
- Chính sách review lương hàng năm;
- Chế độ thưởng: Thưởng tất cả các ngày lễ, tết; thưởng cuối năm theo KQKD của công ty;
- Được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ bảo hiểm và ngày nghỉ, lễ theo quy định của công ty và pháp luật hiện hành;

Title: Manager, Performance Marketing (Product Focus)
Company: British University Vietnam (Buv)
Location: Ecopark township, Van Giang, Hung Yen, Ecopark campus, Ecopark Township, Van Giang district, Hung Yen
Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE

The Manager, Performance Marketing (Product Focus) is responsible for the strategic leadership and execution of go-to-market (GTM) strategies for the university’s academic programmes. This role will focus on developing compelling product positioning and messaging, driving student interest and applications for specific programmes, and ensuring KPI accountability for academic product marketing initiatives. The manager will collaborate closely with academic departments and ensure effective coordination across MarCom divisions to enhance programme visibility and achieve enrolment goals.

AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY

Academic Product Go-to-Market (GTM) Strategy & Planning:

• Lead the development and execution of comprehensive GTM strategies specifically for the university’s portfolio of academic programmes (undergraduate, postgraduate, and other offerings).

• Define and articulate compelling value propositions, messaging, and positioning for each academic programme, tailored to distinct target student personas and market segments.

• Establish, monitor, and take accountability for Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) related to programme awareness, applications, student enrolment quality, and market share for assigned academic products.

• Develop and manage the performance marketing budget for academic product initiatives, ensuring optimal resource allocation and ROI.

• Lead the development of tailored GTM strategies and marketing plans for the launch of new academic programmes and the sustained promotion of existing ones to drive enrolment, engagement, and revenue.

• Collaborate with internal MarCom teams (Digital Marketing, Brand Marketing, PR & Communications, Marketing Services) for cohesive and impactful campaign execution for academic programmes.

Academic Stakeholder Collaboration & Insights:

• Serve as the primary marketing liaison for Academic Deans, Heads of Department, and programme development teams, translating academic features and strengths into effective marketing strategies.

• Conduct market research, competitor analysis, and student insight gathering to inform programme marketing strategies, identify differentiation opportunities, and advise on market demand.

• Undertake stakeholder consultation with academic staff to ensure accurate representation of programmes and gather insights for compelling communication planning.

Campaign Development & Execution Oversight (Product Focus):

• Oversee the planning, development, and execution of integrated marketing campaigns to launch new academic programmes and drive applications for existing programmes.

• Ensure the development of high-quality marketing collateral, content, and sales enablement materials specific to academic programmes.

• Monitor the student journey related to programme information discovery, enquiry, and application, identifying opportunities for enhancement.

• Coordinate with other MarCom divisions for the execution of programme-specific campaigns, ensuring consistent messaging and effective use of resources.

Communication & Reporting:

• Develop and implement communication plans to support academic programme launches, updates, and ongoing promotion.

• Ensure clear, consistent, and compelling messaging about academic programmes across all marketing touchpoints.

• Report on KPI achievement and the effectiveness of academic product marketing strategies to the Director of Marketing & Communications and relevant academic stakeholders.
Job Requirements:
POSITION SPECIFICATIONS

COMPETENCIES (knowledge, skills, and abilities)

Essential

• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Sales, or a related field.

• Minimum of 5-6 years of progressive experience in performance marketing, trade marketing, or sales-driven marketing roles, with a proven track record of developing and executing successful GTM strategies that drive sales and revenue.

• At least 3 years of experience in a leadership or managerial role, directly managing and developing a marketing or sales support team.

• Demonstrable experience in:

• Strategic planning and execution of GTM strategies, including product positioning and messaging.
• Managing marketing budgets and optimising ROI.
• Market research, competitive analysis, and customer segmentation.
• Developing and managing multi-channel marketing campaigns.
• Data analysis and reporting, with the ability to derive actionable insights to improve product performance.
• Stakeholder management, particularly with academic or product development teams.
• Coordinating with multiple marketing disciplines to deliver integrated campaigns.

Desirable

• Master’s degree or relevant professional certifications (e.g., Product Marketing certification).
• Knowledge and understanding of the international higher education sector, programme development, and student recruitment lifecycle.
• Experience in developing marketing strategies for educational programmes.
• Familiarity with CRM systems and marketing automation platforms.

COMPETENCIES (behavioural)

Essential

• Strategic Orientation & Leadership
• Effective Communication & Interpersonal Skills
• Managing & Developing People
• Planning & Organising
• Problem Solving & Decision Making
• Collaboration & Teamwork
• Results Driven
Desirable
• Creative Thinking & Innovation
• Analytical Thinking
• Adaptability & Resilience
• Influencing Skills

Title: Retail Sales Management Assistant
Company: Lotte Mall West Lake Hanoi
Location: LOTTE MALL West Lake Hanoi, 683 Lạc Long Quân, Phú Thượng, Tây Hồ, Hà Nội, Lotte Mall West Lake Hanoi, 683 Lạc Long Quân, Phú Thượng, Tây Hồ, Hà Nội
Job Description:
1. Floor Operations
- Conduct regular floor checks to supervise hygiene, technical issues, and operational activities.
- Ensure product quality, pricing, tagging, and visual merchandising of assigned brands comply with Lotte Mall regulations.
- Collaborate with the Customer Service team to train and supervise brand staff on adhering to mall policies.
- Work with the Customer Service team and other relevant departments to promptly and effectively resolve customer complaints and other arising issues.

2. Promotion & Marketing Events
- Coordinate with tenants in a timely manner to support marketing programs, promotional events, staff coordination, and merchandise management to ensure brand professionalism and boost revenue.
- Participate in planning and organizing marketing events in collaboration with the Sales Planning & Marketing team to increase sales and attract new customers.
- Encourage and assist brands in proposing seasonal promotions and participating in major Lotte events (e.g., Gala Night, Lotte Private Sale, Anniversary), as well as promotional activities through Lotte channels (Facebook, Website, LCD screens, etc.).

3. Leasing Support
- Support the Manager and General Manager in leasing activities when premises become available.
- Maintain and develop strong relationships with existing and potential tenants.
- Manage the extension or termination of Tenancy Agreements upon expiration, including notifying tenants of termination procedures and processing deposit returns.

4. Sales Reporting & Payment Monitoring
- Accurately input confirmed sales, deductions, and manual adjustments; resolve sales discrepancies promptly.
- Monitor sales performance and collaborate with low-performing brands to prepare sales improvement plans.
- Prepare, compare, and analyze monthly sales and profit reports.

5. Fitting-Out Support
- Advise tenants on Lotte Mall’s construction and fitting-out regulations.
- Assist tenants throughout the fitting-out period and during their grand opening to ensure a smooth launch.

- Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
- Minimum of 1 year of experience in a similar role within the retail, shopping mall, commercial, or trade sectors.
- Proficient in both verbal and written communication in English and Vietnamese.
- Hard-working, with strong teamwork and interpersonal communication skills.
- Able to work under pressure and demonstrate a high level of self-motivation.
- Willing and available to work on a shift basis, 5 days per week (Shift 1: 08:30 – 17:30; Shift 2: 14:30 – 22:30)

BENEFITS:

- Training & development: Personal development course, professional training course, rotation opportunities within subsidiaries
- 15 paid-leave annually; Social, Health, Unemployment insurance in accordance to Labor Law
- Health care scheme: PVI Health insurance; Annual health check

- Lunch/Dinner at canteen; Free motorbike parking; Perdiem for Business Trip; Team building Activities

Title: Manager, Performance Marketing (Student Services & Pre-Uni Products)
Company: British University Vietnam (Buv)
Location: Ecopark township, Van Giang, Hung Yen, Ecopark campus, Ecopark Township, Van Giang district, Hung Yen
Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE

The Manager, Performance Marketing (Student Services & Pre-Uni Products) is responsible for developing, implementing, and optimising targeted performance marketing strategies to promote key student services (including International Mobility and Student Engagement initiatives) and Pre-University programmes (such as IELTS preparation and the International Foundation Programme). This role will focus on driving awareness, engagement, lead generation, and enrolment/participation by effectively reaching and converting relevant target audiences (prospective students, parents, and current students). The manager will ensure KPI accountability and collaborate across MarCom and with relevant university departments.

AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY

Performance Marketing Strategy & Planning (Student Services & Pre-Uni Products):

• Develop and execute comprehensive performance marketing and go-to-market (GTM) strategies tailored to International Mobility services, Student Engagement programmes, IELTS courses, and the International Foundation Programme.

• Define target audience segments (e.g., prospective high school students, pathway students, current undergraduate students), craft compelling value propositions, and develop key messaging for each offering.

• Establish, track, and take accountability for Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) including lead generation, application numbers, enrolment rates (for Pre-Uni products), participation rates (for services), engagement metrics, and ROI.

• Prepare, manage, and optimise the performance marketing budget allocated to these specific services and products.

• Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities and ensure offerings are positioned effectively.

Campaign Management & Multi-Channel Execution:

• Lead the planning, development, and execution of integrated digital marketing campaigns across various channels (e.g., paid search, social media advertising, display advertising, email marketing, content marketing) to promote assigned services and programmes.

• Collaborate closely with the Digital Marketing team for technical campaign setup, execution, and optimisation, and with the Marketing Services team for the development of creative assets and content.

• Implement A/B testing and other conversion rate optimisation (CRO) activities to continuously improve campaign performance.

• Ensure a seamless user journey from awareness to conversion/participation for all promoted offerings.

Stakeholder Collaboration & Communication:

• Act as the primary marketing point of contact for internal stakeholders, including heads of departments for Student Experience, International Office, Admissions, and Academic departments responsible for Pre-Uni programmes.

• Consult with stakeholders to understand programme/service specifics, objectives, and student needs, translating these into effective marketing strategies and communication plans.

• Coordinate with relevant MarCom divisions to ensure consistent messaging and brand representation across all promotional activities.

Data Analysis, Reporting & Optimisation:

• Establish a comprehensive analytics framework to track, measure, and report on the performance of marketing campaigns for student services and Pre-Uni products against agreed KPIs.

• Analyse campaign data and audience insights to identify trends, opportunities for improvement, and provide actionable recommendations to stakeholders.

• Prepare regular performance reports for the Director of Marketing and Communications and other relevant stakeholders.
Job Requirements:
POSITION SPECIFICATIONS

COMPETENCIES (knowledge, skills, and abilities)

Essential

• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Sales, or a related field.
• A minimum of 5 years of progressive experience in performance marketing or digital marketing, with a proven track record of developing and executing successful campaigns that drive measurable results (leads, conversions, engagement).
• At least 2 years of experience in a role with significant responsibility for marketing specific products or services; managerial or team lead experience is a plus.
• Demonstrable experience in:
• Strategic planning and execution of GTM strategies, including product positioning and messaging.
• Managing marketing budgets and optimising ROI.
• Developing and managing multi-channel marketing campaigns.
• Data analysis and reporting, with the ability to derive actionable insights to improve product performance.
• Stakeholder management, particularly with academic or product development teams.
• Coordinating with multiple marketing disciplines to deliver integrated campaigns.

Desirable

• Master’s degree or relevant professional certifications (e.g., Product Marketing certification).
• Knowledge and understanding of the international higher education sector, programme development, and student recruitment lifecycle.
• Experience in developing marketing strategies for educational programmes.
• Familiarity with CRM systems and marketing automation platforms.

COMPETENCIES (behavioural)

Essential

• Strategic Orientation & Leadership
• Effective Communication & Interpersonal Skills
• Managing & Developing People
• Planning & Organising
• Problem Solving & Decision Making
• Collaboration & Teamwork
• Results Driven

Desirable

• Creative Thinking & Innovation
• Analytical Thinking
• Adaptability & Resilience

Title: Sales Engineer

Job Description:
Jobscope
Reporting to the Sales Manager, the successful candidate will be responsible for developing and expanding the regional business for the industrial segment.
The candidate will monitor daily sales activities to achieve the sales target for SEW range of product and actively develop new business opportunities.
The candidate will be responsible in developing sales strategies for the growth of existing and new accounts, as well as organize and participate in road show, sales & marketing activities and trade show.
Responsibilities

• Technical competency to engage customers for application and specification review
• Good presentation, interpersonal and communication skills in English & Vietnamese
• Analytical mind with good problem solving skills and willing to learn

Title: Onpoint Nextgen Leaders Program 2025
Company: Công Ty TNHH Onpoint
Location: 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Đa Kao, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam, Tầng 4 toà nhà AB, 27B Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, P. Đa Kao, Quận 1, TP.HCM
Job Description:
1. WHAT IS OnPoint NEXTGEN LEADERS?
The NextGen Leaders Program is OnPoint’s executive-track initiative designed for mid-level managers ready to take a bold step toward senior leadership.
We’re seeking high-potential professionals who are already leading business units, growth initiatives, or innovation agendas — and who are ready to grow into Director roles within 2 years. Whether your background is in Commercial, Digital Marketing, Technology or Logistics Operations, this is the place for bold thinkers and builders.
2. WHY THIS PROGRAM EXISTS
At OnPoint, we’re driving transformation at the intersection of commerce, technology, and customer experience.
To scale our vision, we need more than managers — we need NEXTGEN LEADERS who:
• Bring multi-disciplinary thinking
• Can lead cross-functional teams and end-to-end business impact
• Are ready to shape strategy, culture, and growth from the inside out
The NextGen Leaders Program is our boldest investment in top-tier external talent — leaders who will define what’s next in Vietnam’s digital economy.
3. THE SELECTION JOURNEY
• Round 1: Tell Your Story
Submit your application and tell us who you are, what drives you, and how you envision creating leadership impact at OnPoint.
• Round 2: Strategic Capability Challenge
You’ll take a multi-dimensional leadership assessment designed to test your strategic mindset, agility, and problem-solving capacity.
• Round 3: 48-Hour Business Case Challenge
You’ll tackle a real-world business challenge in digital commerce — with 48 hours to prepare and present your solution to a panel of top executives, including the CEO, Deputy CEO, HRD, and functional Heads (Tech, BD, Marketing, and Operations).
4. READY TO STEP INTO EXECUTIVE GROWTH?
Whether you're building platforms, scaling brands, or crafting strategy — this is your moment to go further, faster. Applications open now. Deadline: [Apply Before 4 July)
Job Requirements:
WHO SHOULD APPLY
We’re calling for external high-potential talent in functions including:
• Business Development & Commercial Strategy
• Digital Marketing & Performance Growth
• eCommerce & Fulfilment Operations
• AI, Data & Technology Product
• Service Solutions & Client Success
You are likely:
• A next-generation manager with 3–5 years of experience managing teams or functions.
• A proven performer with a track record of delivering results
• Comfortable with ambiguity, scale, and transformation
• Eager to grow into a regional or enterprise-level leadership role
This is for those who are not looking for comfort — but for challenge, growth, and impact.

WHAT YOU’LL GAIN
• This is an accelerated leadership runway — designed for future executives.
• You will:
- Solve real strategic challenges across commerce, tech, and growth
- Collaborate with and be mentored by OnPoint’s C-suite
- Build advanced capability in business acumen, influence, and decision-making
- Fast-track your career toward Director roles in 24 months
- Join an elite cohort of emerging leaders from diverse functions

Title: Software Developer (Fresher and Junior)
Company: Netcompany
Location: Opal Tower 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, HCMC, Opal Tower Building, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh city
Job Description:
About the role
Netcompany is currently looking for ambitious graduates to join us on a permanent basis to drive forward our delivery capability and deliver the optimum solutions to our clients in Europe. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work with some of the most skilled IT consultants in Vietnam and our technically skilled employees in Europe.
As an employee in Netcompany you will also benefit from our large and global knowledge-based communities, Centers of Excellence. This covers a wide range of different knowledge groups, from specific technologies like .NET and Java to Architecture, Security and AI to name a few. Combined, they offer the chance to learn from the best across our different countries.

Job Description
• Analyze and understand business and technical requirements and work with clients across different domains and industries
• Produce high-quality design deliverables that describes how the solution will accommodate business and technical requirements
• Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using best practices
• Conduct continuous unit and manual testing and deliver high quality solutions
• Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to troubleshoot and address issues
• Work and collaborate in an agile international environment with experienced and skilled colleagues in Vietnam and Europe
• Plan and organize your own work and accurately report issues and progress in a timely manner
• Identify areas for own personal development
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree within a relevant IT specialization
• Good English skills both in writing and verbally
• Basic understanding of and practical experience with object-oriented programming and data modelling
• Familiar with various design, architectural patterns and modern system development
• Open towards and able to quickly learn new technologies
• Ability to work both independently and collaboratively as part of an international team
• Professional pro-active attitude, taking responsibility and initiative
• Effectively estimate work and produce deliverables on time

Recruitment process:

- Phone Screening (English Proficiency Test): Once your application is reviewed and meets the qualifications, the Recruitment Team will reach out to you via phone for a discussion. Please note, you may receive a call from an unknown number after submitting your application.

- In-person Interview (Conducted in English, 2 hours): The interview will take place at our office and will be conducted entirely in English. The session will be divided into two parts: Introduction round and Technical round.

Title: Manager, Performance MKT (Trade Focus)
Company: British University Vietnam (Buv)
Location: Ecopark township, Van Giang, Hung Yen, Ecopark campus, Ecopark Township, Van Giang district, Hung Yen
Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE

The Manager, Performance Marketing (Trade Focus) is responsible for the strategic leadership and execution of go-to-market (GTM) strategies aimed at driving student enrolment and revenue through specific schools, sales channels, and business units. This role will focus on optimising the sales funnel, managing relationships with sales-focused stakeholders, and ensuring KPI accountability for trade-related marketing initiatives. The manager will ensure effective coordination across MarCom divisions to achieve ambitious growth targets.

AREAS OF RESPONSIBILITY

Trade-Focused Go-to-Market (GTM) Strategy & Planning:

• Act as the strategic marketing lead for designated Schools, Sales teams, and Business Units, developing and implementing comprehensive GTM strategies focused on sales conversion and recruitment targets.
• Define clear messaging and positioning tailored to various sales channels and target audiences to drive enrolment.
• Establish, monitor, and take accountability for KPIs related to lead generation, conversion rates, student enrolment, and revenue for assigned areas.
• Develop and manage the performance marketing budget for trade-focused initiatives, ensuring optimal resource allocation and ROI.
• Lead the development of tailored GTM strategies and campaigns to drive enrolment and revenue through specific sales channels.
• Collaborate with internal MarCom teams (Digital Marketing, Brand Marketing, PR & Communications, Marketing Services) for seamless and integrated campaign execution.

Sales & Stakeholder Collaboration & Insights:

• Serve as the primary marketing liaison for Heads of School, Sales teams, recruitment partners, and Business Unit leaders, translating their objectives into actionable marketing plans.
• Conduct market analysis and gather insights specific to sales channels and competitor activities to inform GTM strategies.
• Undertake stakeholder consultation to ensure alignment and gather insights for effective communication and campaign planning.
• Analyse sales funnel performance, identify areas for improvement, and implement marketing strategies to enhance conversion rates.

Campaign Development & Execution Oversight (Trade Focus):

• Oversee the planning, development, and execution of targeted lead generation campaigns, promotional activities, and initiatives to directly support sales objectives and enrolment targets.
• Ensure all trade marketing activities are aligned with the university’s overall brand strategy and quality standards.
• Monitor the performance of trade marketing campaigns, providing regular reports to stakeholders with actionable insights and optimisation strategies.
• Coordinate with other MarCom divisions for the execution of campaigns, ensuring consistent messaging and effective use of resources.

Communication & Reporting:

• Develop and implement communication plans to support trade marketing initiatives and promotions.
• Ensure clear, consistent, and compelling messaging across all sales-related marketing touchpoints.
• Report on KPI achievement and the effectiveness of trade marketing strategies to the Director of Marketing & Communications and relevant stakeholders.
Job Requirements:
POSITION SPECIFICATIONS

COMPETENCIES (knowledge, skills, and abilities)

Essential

• Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Sales, or a related field.

• Minimum of 5-6 years of progressive experience in performance marketing, trade marketing, or sales-driven marketing roles, with a proven track record of developing and executing successful GTM strategies that drive sales and revenue.

• At least 3 years of experience in a leadership or managerial role, directly managing and developing a marketing or sales support team.

• Demonstrable experience in:

• Strategic planning and execution of GTM strategies for specific sales channels or business units.
• Managing marketing budgets and optimising ROI in a sales context.
• Utilising CRM systems (e.g., Salesforce) for lead management and sales reporting.
• Data analysis and reporting, with the ability to derive actionable insights to improve sales performance.
• Developing and managing lead generation and direct response campaigns.
• Stakeholder management, particularly with sales teams and business unit leaders.
• Coordinating with multiple marketing disciplines to deliver integrated campaigns.

Desirable

• Master’s degree or relevant professional certifications.
• Knowledge and understanding of the international higher education sector and its specific sales cycles and recruitment challenges.
• Experience in managing relationships with external agencies, recruitment partners, or vendors.
• Direct experience with marketing automation platforms.

COMPETENCIES (behavioural)

Essential

• Strategic Orientation & Leadership
• Effective Communication & Interpersonal Skills
• Managing & Developing People
• Planning & Organising
• Problem Solving & Decision Making
• Collaboration & Teamwork
• Results Driven & Sales Acumen

Desirable

• Creative Thinking & Innovation
• Relationship Building & Networking
• Adaptability & Resilience
• Negotiation Skills

Job Description:

Kiểm tra tính hợp lệ, hợp pháp của các chứng từ liên quan đến các nghiệp vụ kinh tế phát sinh, tiến hành ghi chép tài khoản vào các sổ sách.
2. Tiếp nhận các đề nghị thanh toán từ các bộ phận, kiểm tra, tạo thanh toán, vào chi phí đối với các khoản chi
3. Theo dõi, hạch toán, tính khấu hao, phân bổ TSCĐ và CCDC trên sổ kế toán và báo cáo thuế, lập quyết toán thuế
4. Theo dõi, đối chiếu, đốc thúc thu hồi công nợ với nhà cung cấp, bảo hiểm, khách hàng, đối tác…

6. Lập báo cáo và gửi các báo cáo kế toán, báo cáo thống kê theo yêu cầu của Trưởng phòng
7. Hướng dẫn, kiểm tra và hiệu chỉnh (nếu có) nghiệp vụ cho các phần hành kế toán của công ty trong công tác xử lý số liệu, hạch toán các nghiệp vụ kinh tế phát sinh
8. Sắp xếp, kiểm tra, bảo quản, lưu trữ chứng từ, sổ sách, dữ liệu kế toán của công ty
Job Requirements:
Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Kế toán tài chính, kế toán doanh nghiệp, kiểm toán, tài chính
Thành thạo MISA AMIS ; tin học văn phòng
Am hiểu, nắm rõ các luật kế toán, quy định, tiêu chuẩn kế toán
